name: Slimo Blorbo - Heir Of Slime
description:
• A Quirky  2.5D Puzzle-Platformer.
  • That uses SoftBody Technology to create Bouncy Platforming.
  • Inspired by the Slavic myth of Kolobok.
  • Our MC(Slimo) is a tasty slime that the whole world wants to eat.
  • Maneuver the world with Slime Powers to escape your Pursuers.

This is my Production College Course Project.
